mapper.select: SELECT library_no, isbn, end_date, star FROM Library ORDER BY library_no

SELECT l.*, b.title, b.author, b.publisher, c.content
FROM Library l INNER JOIN Book b USING (isbn)
LEFT JOIN Comment c ON b.isbn = c.isbn
WHERE l.library_no=#{libraryNo} ORDER BY library_no
SELECT * FROM Library ORDER BY library_no LIMIT #{startRow},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Library (isbn, user_id, end_date, star, comment) VALUES (#{isbn}, #{user_id}, #{end_date}, #{star}, #{comment})
